# frameInScreenCoordinates

**Instance Property**

The frame of the access point in screen coordinates.

## Declaration

```swift
var frameInScreenCoordinates: CGRect { get }
```

```swift
var frameInScreenCoordinates: NSRect { get }
```

## Discussion

This is an observable property.

## Managing the location

- **location**: The corner of the screen to display the access point.
- **GKAccessPoint.Location**: Specifies the corner of the screen to display the access point.
- **parentWindow**: The window that contains the access point.
